title: Bubble Wand
summaries: The Bubble Wand is an auto-swing novelty item that produces rainbow-colored bubbles. The bubbles are purely visual, have no functional effect, and can be produced infinitely at no cost. The Bubble Wand is purchased from the Party Girl for 5 GC.

Each bubble is of a random size, and a random one of four possible colors: Pink, purple, green, or blue. With no obstacles in the way, bubbles last for random durations. They will pop on contact with characters or foreground <linked>blocks</linked>.

statistics.Buy: 5 GC
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
